description: Cedar of Lebanon is an amazing coniferous species. Its dense foliage, known for its rich blue-greens hues and stately appearance add beauty and privacy to landscapes. These trees also have a natural resistance to disease and pests and can live up to a thousand years. The Cedar of Lebanon has also been used in art and literature throughout history to symbolise power and strength, and are mentioned in the bible. A truly remarkable species, the Cedar of Lebanon will bring life to any garden or landscape.
